snippet: A letter to the City Council speaker Christine C. Quinn from the tennis star Martina Navratilova about anti-gay and racist epithets brings a promise from the drivers’ union.
abstract: A letter to the City Council speaker Christine C. Quinn from the tennis star Martina Navratilova about anti-gay and racist epithets brings a promise from the drivers’ union.

headline.main: Quinn Rebukes Carriage Industry After Driver Hurls Slurs
headline.print_headline: After Driver’s Slurs, Quinn Rebukes Carriage Industry
